summary: No more weird tattooed goats. Dremora race and every individual Dremora has been modified to look like a fearsome Daedra.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][color=orange]This mod has been superceded by:[/color][/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50282/?]Dagon's Legions[/url]

No more weird tattooed goats. Dremora race and every individual Dremora has been modified to look like a fearsome Daedra.

Or Darth Maul.

* New demonic eyes
* Small horns for lesser Dremora, big horns for Lords
* New face textures

Requirements: Skyrim
Recommended: Glorious Daedric Retexture - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30612/?

All parts of mod can be used with credit; no permission necessary
author: BetrayalSeeker
